p: Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) was performed in a TG-STDA model TGA/STDA851e/LF/1600 thermobalance from Mettler-Toledo, LLC (Columbus, OH, USA). The samples, with a weight of about 15 mg, were heated from 50 °C to 800 °C at a heating rate of 10 °C/min under a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow-rate of 50 mL/min.
